text: Alejandro "Álex" de la Iglesia Mendoza (born 4 December 1965) is a Spanish movie director, screenwriter, producer and former comic book artist. He is known for his dark comedy and horror movies. His best known works are The Last Circus (2010) and As Luck Would Have It (2011). ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish movie directors Category:Spanish screenwriters Category:Spanish movie producers Category:Spanish comics artists
title: Álex de la Iglesia
